body: ThePlagueMan...from what I gather, the spray is a hypnotic that makes a person obey your commands to some extent. I would guess that the more times you spray the person the longer the effects last. The spray he was using at that time was apparently modified at least twice since the other versions did not work on the chick he wanted to bang. However the weaker versions worked well against other people. So we have no idea what his resistance level was. It looked like someone had bumped into him and the chick he was banging which caused him to fall and accidentally spray himself. At that point he was under hypnotic suggestion. The chick then screamed at the guy who bumped into them. She probably said something like "go kill yourself". Since he was under suggestion that was a command and he rammed his head into the brick ledge thus killing himself. That is what I could put together.
Why'd he kill himself?
Ntr with Happy end!? Favourites

Even for a work from my god of deepthroat and irrumatios, Poncocchan, I kinda lost track of the story when he got his revenge on the deliquent (?) girl, it escalated way too much out of proportion, and when the end was near the 4p at the infirmary was GREAT, BUT, then the next couple of pages also made it weak again... so, until page 64, a masterpiece, the rest, not so much, at least for me.

Th blowjob parts are god tier

Easily the best irrumatio, deepthroat, cumplay artist out there. Especially his other works with more throat action clearly showcase that. Though this manga was also superb ;). For a long time, I thought Fue was #1. But there are many reasons why Poncocchan is just that much better. His artstyle is more detailed, he gets really creative with cumplay, his girls are younger/cuter (though that's more of a personal preference) and his stories are engaging to read. Also, I love how realistically he adjusts a character's pronunciation depending on what/how much stuff they have in their mouth, making the situations just that much more immersive. This is unfortunately something that gets lost in translation or rather it gets "flattened out" thus sounding a bit generic.
10/10 would learn Japanese again just to read raw Poncocchan-sama! That and CM3D2 :p

...No but seriously, you don't even realize how much you are missing when you have to rely on translations, no matter how good they are.
Let's face it, bitch had it coming. A fitting end for such a bastard.

Guys his ability has increased soooo much over the past few years.  His throat stuff still can't rival Fue-sama, but his expressiveness in faces and mastery of complicated poses is really something.  Top five favorite H mangakas for sure.

Other than that ending it was fantastic. I’d expect nothing less from poncochan (misspelled), he even managed to handle that NTR/Cheat-ish scenario really well, the beginning of that arc had me really worried at first but he really stuck the landing and I can’t praise his handling of it with words honestly. Absolutely Fantastic.
Karma is a bitch.
